title: 01/31/22 DPS Hour 2 Marcus Spears
itunes:title: 01/31/22 DPS Hour 2 Marcus Spears
description:
Marcus Spears tells Dan that he wants to focus on the teams that won and not the ones who lost. Marcus says the adjustments made by the Bengals on defense were genius.
